    Storyline

    Win studies Innovative Multimedia Technology (IMT) at SPSM and is preparing for Communication Arts at Chulalongkorn University.

    His work combines Apple-grade precision with cinematic imagination, spanning interactive web systems, robotics, photography, and film experiments.

    Apple-grade precision Cinematic imagination Offline-first design systems
